## Yuzhou Zhai

I Graduated from Shanghai Jiao Tong University, majoring in Electrical and Computer Engineering, with a minor in Data Science. I'm an Energetic and creative student leader with proven abilities of managing large teams and organizing events. I am Deeply passionate about studying and leveraging data analytical skills to unravel key answers from large, varied and complex datasets in business intelligence field.
